DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional , Long-term Safety Data Collection Zarzio速 / Filgrastim HEXAL速 Stem Cell Donors
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-interventional long term data collection study . Adult healthy unrelated stem cell donor receive Sandoz ' filgrastim accord stem cell mobilization protocol respective apheresis center monitor safety efficacy mobilization period , systematic safety data follow-up implement 10 year mobilization .
DOC.criteria: Volunteer adult healthy unrelated donor receive least one dose Sandoz ' filgrastim PBPC mobilization Donors age < 18 year Related recipient Chronic significant organ disease Systemic autoimmune diseases Chronic infectious disease History malignant disease Pregnant breastfeed woman Hypersensitivity E. coli derive protein Hypersensitivity active substance excipients Sandoz ' filgrastim Absolute relative contraindication specify SmPC Sandoz ' filgrastim Participation previous stem cell mobilization procedures Previous concurrent use mobilize agent , e.g . plerixafor Informed consent sign prior begin documentation .
DOC.keyword: recombinant human granulocyte colony stimulate factor
